mapper.select: select o.id,orderNo,orderDate,totalNumber,totalPrice,bankAccountId,o.createBy,o.updateBy,o.updateDate, b.bandCount as bankAccountName, c.userName as createByName,u.userName as updateByName from xs_order o LEFT JOIN sys_user c on o.createBy=c.userId LEFT JOIN sys_user u on o.updateBy=u.userId, bank_account b where o.bankAccountId=b.id and o.isDelete=0 and c.isDel=0 and u.isDel=0 and b.isDel=0 and orderNo like concat('%',#{orderNo},'%')
